thread.title: Khloe Kardashian attends Kim's baby shower
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian attends Kim's baby shower - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Khloe Kardashian attends Kim's baby shower
text:
@kyliejenner via Instagram Kylie Jenner shared this image on Instagram featuring her sisters, Kendall Jenner, Kourtney Kardashian, Khloe Kardashian, and Kim Kardashian on Oct. 25 with the caption, "Baby shower vibes." Khloe Kardashian proved to be a trooper for her sister Kim.
Amid her husband Lamar Odom’s hospitalization, the reality star attended her big sister’s Troop Beverly Hills-themed baby shower Saturday in Los Angeles.
This is the first time Khloe has publicly left Odom’s side since he nearly died in a Nevada brothel on Oct. 13.
The 35-year-old former NBA champ was transferred to Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles on Monday after waking from a coma last Friday at Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas.
The shower for Kim and Kanye West’s baby boy (due on Christmas Day) was postponed one week after Odom was rushed to the hospital.
@kyliejenner via Instagram Kylie Jenner shared a picture her and sister Kendall Jenner on Oct. 25 with the caption, "just our usual morning routine #troopbeverlyhills #sipstea." The rescheduled soirée was also attended by Khloe’s momager, Kris Jenner, her sister Kourtney, and her half-sisters Kylie and Kendall Jenner.
Kylie posted a group shot of her sisters on Instagram. They wore matching pajamas and drank tea in front of tepees.
Despite her presence at the party, don’t expect Khloe to return back into the spotlight anytime soon.
Sources told Us Weekly she canceled an upcoming press tour for her new book , “Strong Looks Better Than Naked” to take care of her husband.
mhood@nydailynews.com
